welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Halen, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. Get ready to explore and immerse yourselves in the unique culture and charm of our city. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B

terminals.name: Terminal C
